SummaryEnglish:
In “Latair the Earth,” a child meets Latair, a fairy of the Earth. With Latair’s magical powers, the child transforms into various creatures and embarks on a journey through ecosystems around the world, becoming friends with the animals they encounter. However, these new friends are all endangered species. Moved by a desire to protect them, the child decides to become an Earth Saver.
Through this heartfelt and adventurous tale, the anime offers a fun and accessible way to connect with the importance of biodiversity.
